Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other,Unknown
Summary: Typical saucer shape, small no more than 15 feet accross. No windows, no swastikas, no exhaust and no movement. When I stopped the truck to get a better look it disappeared!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Homewood
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details While working at my local supermarket for the past 6 months I have learned that up to 6 P.D.Q. employees have been subject to unidentified ariel phonomena, one of whom just had her 2nd sighting. You may find up to 4 of these employees working in the deli on any given day which would on some days make up the entire deli staff. A local jacuzzi cleaner by the name of Jeff Hacket who comes into the store also claims to have seen UFOs and has interest in the phonomena having loaned me a high quality VHS on UFOs. I will be collecting drawings and brief descriptions from each eyewitness and faxing them to you shortly.
